title: Day 1174
content:
# Day 1174

One thing about me. I will spread Bitcoin propoganda shameslessly. I will help orange pill others because I feel it is a moral imperative. It makes the world a better place.

And the best part? AI makes it so easy to do so.

6/8/25

Conor Jay Chepenik
